mdirect.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual mdirect.h(7)

NAME

opendir, readir, closedir — directory routines

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <mdirect.h>

struct dirent;
typedef struct dirent DIR;

struct dirent*
opendir(char const*);

struct dirent*
readdir(struct dirent *const);

int
closedir(struct dirent *const);

INCLUDES

<direct.h> or <dirent.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides standard routines for directory operations on platforms that does not implement them.

Accessing the d_name member of struct dirent is portable. It is not recommended, however, to use other fields that may or may not be available on all platforms.

SEE ALSO

opendir(3), closedir(3,) readdir(3)

July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
